segments.text: Suddenly, I spot the overflow from the sink—wow, that's unexpected.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet's running full blast, and no one's stopping it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just polishing that plate, totally zoned out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water everywhere, and her foot's in it without a flinch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Over to the side, a boy's on a stool grabbing cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar's open, and he's balancing precariously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I didn't expect the stool to look so off-kilter like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's reaching up too, part of this sneaky operation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's amazing how the woman hasn't turned around yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside is serene, contrasting this indoor surprise.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle widening on the floor—didn't see that coming so fast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole setup feels like a hidden disaster about to unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm caught off guard by how oblivious everyone seems.
segments.speaker: PAR
